name: Prakzar's Problematic Potion Puzzle Pit
description:
Prakzar has fallen into a pit filled with potions. Help Prakzar live as long as possible while getting the high score. Throw and jump on beakers of potions to break open, creating combos toward your score.

All touching potions of the same color boost your combo multiplier. Careful though, the larger the combo, the more potent the reaction effects!

As the game progresses, more and more beakers will be dropped into the pit creating an unstable chain reaction!

Beaker Types:

  • Red - Fire rains down from above, damaging everything
  • Blue - Temporarily slows Prakzar and limits jumping
  • Green - Spawns boulders from the center of the pit
  • Purple - Releases a toxic cloud doing damage over time to Prakzar
  • Yellow - Generates a home ball lightening, dealing damage Prakzar
